description_for_model: noscha.io provides disposable email forwarding (username@noscha.io), subdomain DNS (username.noscha.io), and NIP-05 Nostr identity verification. All services are paid via Lightning Network invoices (bolt11). No signup required. Plans range from 1 day to 1 year. Use GET /api/check/{username} to check availability, POST /api/order to create an order with a Lightning invoice, GET /api/order/{order_id}/status to poll payment status, and POST /api/renew to extend rentals.
